column1: Kata Robata////We also had hamachi kama - good but nothing special than what I've had before
column2: salmon sashimi- very fresh, good quality
column3: spicy chopped scallop with added quail eggs- first time I had raw scallop so it was different, not bad at all but not wow for me
column4: grilled shiitake mushroom- can't never go wrong with grilled mushroom
column5: mixed ceviche- good and great presentation
column6: rising sun roll -pretty nice yellow tail and avocado inside and topped with peppercorn tuna. I thought it was pretty good but my family didnt really like the peppercorn tuna.
